stories.title: New Federal Standards Will Reshape How We Charge EVs

stories.text:
What hardware asset management tools do you use for quickly booking network-connected systems?

Are there any that offer a spreadsheet-like interface (i.e., data cells plus keyboard-friendly inline edits) and expose a REST API for complex queries against user-defined properties and relations?

We're using a spreadsheet to reserve hardware, which is no longer adequate, yet wonderfully efficient:

https://i.stack.imgur.com/k9Cd0.png
stories.title: Ask HN: Hardware asset management and booking system

stories.text: I block scripts on the NYT website with Brave. Every day I hav played wordle without issue until today, when it won't load unless I allow scripts on the page. I understood there would be no changes, but obviously this is a change.
stories.title: Tell HN: Wordle doesn't work if you block scripts on NYT website
